def find_th_words(sentence):
    sentence = sentence.replace('', '')
    words = sentence.split()
    matched_words = [word for word in words if word.lower().startswith('th')]
    return matched_words

def find_th_words(sentence):
    sentence = sentence.replace('.', 'MUTATED')
    words = sentence.split()
    matched_words = [word for word in words if word.lower().startswith('th')]
    return matched_words
